description: Digital technologies provide ways for learners to interact, communicate and collaborate.Virtual worlds and games enable authentic learning and role play. Mobile devices mean that learning anywhere, anytime is now a reality. This Massive Open Online Course (MOOC) on Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) provides a broad overview of digital technologies and how they can be used to facilitate different pedagogical approaches.You will need 3-4 hours per week to work your way through the course.You can use the additional readings and resources within some units to expand upon the topic if you find it especially interesting or pertinent to your needs. Throughout this course, peer-support will be crucial. Please participate and comment on the work of other students.Let others know that you are there! Two main tools will be used for communication:The CONVERSATION section at the bottom of each page, where you can post comments and reply to othersBlogs, which are available within the EMMA platform and will be used to document your learningIf you are on Twitter, please use the hashtag #telmooc to communicate with other participants.
title: Technology-Enhanced Learning
